articles.title: Rory McIlroy saves double bogey, keeps himself in mix at U.S. Open
articles.description: Rory McIlroy avoided disaster on the third hole Friday, making a long putt to save double bogey and keep himself in the mix after two rounds at the U.S. Open.

articles.title: Chicago Cubs end 10-game skid while halting Atlanta Braves' 14-game win streak
articles.description: The Cubs became the first team in 23 years to stop a losing streak of 10 or more game while ending an opponent's winning streak of at least 10 games, beating the Braves 1-0 Friday to halt Atlanta's majors-best 14-game run.
articles.content: CHICAGO -- The Chicago Cubs became the first team in 23 years to stop a losing streak of 10 or more game while ending an opponent's winning streak of at least 10 games, beating the Braves 1-0 Friday … [+3352 chars]

articles.title: Gary Bettman unsure if NHL will reinstate Joel Quenneville
articles.description: Gary Bettman said he doesn't "think this is the time" for the NHL to reinstate Joel Quenneville but that the league will "see what happens in the future."
articles.content:
NHL commissioner Gary Bettman isn't sure if he'll be open to reinstating Joel Quenneville if the former coach asks to return to the league.
"I don't know. That's something I'll have to address with … [+2042 chars]

articles.title: Los Angeles Angels veteran Anthony Rendon to have season-ending wrist surgery
articles.description: Los Angeles Angels third baseman Anthony Rendon needs season-ending surgery on his injured right wrist, the team announced on Friday.
articles.content:
SEATTLE -- Los Angeles Angels third baseman Anthony Rendon will undergo surgery for a right wrist injury and miss the rest of the season, the team announced Friday.

articles.title: Davidson men's basketball coach Bob McKillop announces retirement after 33 seasons
articles.description: Davidson coach Bob McKillop is retiring after 33 seasons at the North Carolina school. He will be replaced by his son Matt, who has been an assistant with the team since 2008.
articles.content:
Bob McKillop is retiring after 33 seasons as Davidson's head coach, he announced on Friday.

articles.description: Stephen Curry's No. 30 will be the first number retired by Davidson, which will celebrate arguably the school's best player ever during an Aug. 31 ceremony.

articles.title: Former NASCAR driver Clint Bowyer struck and killed pedestrian in highway accident
articles.description: Former NASCAR driver Clint Bowyer struck and killed a pedestrian on a highway in Missouri earlier this month, police said. Bowyer showed no signs of impairment at the time of the accident.
articles.content:
